content: That's a great point about considering the cost and time of a professional appraisal. I think I'll start by researching online marketplaces and forums to get a rough estimate of Glory's value. I'll also check out some price guides and see if I can find any similar ponies that have sold recently. If I'm still unsure, I might consider consulting with a professional appraiser. Do you think I should also consider getting my comic book collection appraised? I have some rare first editions that I'm not sure about the value of.
